summary: A small, lore friendly home that is hidden in the basement beneath an abandoned shack on a hill among the trees.  It makes a great safehouse for the Thieves Guild.
descriptionHtml:
**************************************
Updated, July 15th, 2013

Fixed the container respawn issue, all containers should be working properly.  I also included some cosmetic changes based on suggestions and stuff that was bothering me.  The abandoned part is much darker now, for instance.  I redid the lighting, hopefully it still looks fine.  And I tweaked some other stuff, too.  Sorry for the delay getting that out, if you still have any issues or suggestions please let me know.

**************************************

Located north and east of Rorikstead, near the Talking Stone Camp, the safehouse is a small but functional lore friendly home that is hidden in the basement beneath an abandoned shack on a hill among the trees. It can provide players with a house or waystation located in the western part of Tamriel, convenient to Solitude, Morthal, and Markarth.  It makes a great safehouse for the Thieves Guild.

Includes:

Inside:
Several chests and other containers
Cooking Pot
2 Beds + 1 Bedroll
Alchemy Table
Enchanting Table
3 Weapon Plaques
2 Mannequins
Tanning rack
Sharpening wheel
Armor table
Blacksmith Forge

Outside:
Woodchopping Block

Not compatible with the Clean version of this mod (check it out here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36492/ )

----------------------------
To do list, as of July 15th

Exterior navmesh is weird (Front part of house seems to be across a zone-dividing line that cannot connect the front door to the rest of the navmesh.  Not sure if there\'s a workaround.)
author: Larinon
